select a.id sqManageScoreId, a.batch_no batchNo, b.name workName, a.project_name projectName, c.dept_name deptName, a.item_name itemName, a.item_score score, a.item_point point, CONCAT(ROUND(a.item_score/a.item_point*100,1),'%') percent, if(a.item_score != a.item_point,if(a.advice = 'null','无',a.advice),'无意见') advice from sq_item a left join bona_frame_mzsrmyy.ac_personnel b on b.work_no = a.work_no left join bona_frame_mzsrmyy.ac_department c on c.id = b.dept_id
a.batch_no = #batchNo#
b.name like '%$workName$%'
a.project_name like '%$projectName$%'
c.dept_name like '%$deptName$%'
if(a.item_score != a.item_point,a.advice,'无意见') != #advice#
CONCAT(ROUND(a.item_score/a.item_point*100,1),'%') != #percent#
group by a.item_name

select COUNT(*) from sq_item a left join bona_frame_mzsrmyy.ac_personnel b on b.work_no = a.work_no
a.batch_no = #batchNo#
b.name like '%$workName$%'
